Workspace Version: 19.1 SR 1 (24.047), Host: 02CPT-DIS07, Operating System: Windows Server 2016 Standard 64-bit Version 1607 (build 14393) (64bit mode,virtualized - VMWare), Date/Time: Wed Apr 28 08:58:35 CAT 2021. AssemblyLine.Name: DisplayAds Pietermaritzburg
AssemblyLine.UserDescription: Display advertisements for Petermaritzburg DTP team which caters for advertisements of the KZN titles (Witness & community titles).

Node.Name: Convert to JPEG
Node.Description: Convert the pdf to a JPEG image for attachment to the customer invoice.

Node.Name: Send Error Emails
Node.Description: Error emails will be send to Tanya Smith and all DTP Bellville team members. Methode content team is also included.
Node.Settings: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?> <SendMailSettings> <SenderEmailAddress>noreply@media24.com</SenderEmailAddress> <EmailSubject>Faulty Advertisement: <JOB_NAME></EmailSubject> <recipients>eidos.content@media24.com</recipients> <recipients>cheryl.moig@media24.com</recipients> <recipients>belinda.naidoo@media24.com</recipients> <recipients>keith.howell@media24.com</recipients> <recipients>nokubonga.ngcobo@media24.com</recipients> <recipients>thokozani.mkhize@media24.com</recipients> <recipients>claudia.banha@media24.com</recipients> <recipients>lwando.ndabeni@media24.com</recipients> <recipients>thokozani.mkhize@media24.com</recipients> <recipients>jenny.poliah@media24.com</recipients> <addRunlistFilesAsAttachments>true</addRunlistFilesAsAttachments> <MessageText>Check the following Advert <JOB_NAME> - It has failed on the <ASSEMBLY_LINE_NAME>. Please check the attached log for the error.  <JOB_NO></MessageText> <SmtpNetResource> <host>152.111.1.10</host> <port>25</port> <username>eidos@media24.com</username> <secure>false</secure> <type>SMTP</type> <description>NoReplyAsura@media24.com</description> <PassiveModeForced>false</PassiveModeForced> <SkipTemporaryRenaming>true</SkipTemporaryRenaming> <UTF8EncodingForced>true</UTF8EncodingForced> <UseDirectoryListingForReload>false</UseDirectoryListingForReload> <UseProxy>false</UseProxy> <SkipOperatingSystemDetection>false</SkipOperatingSystemDetection> </SmtpNetResource> </SendMailSettings>

Node.Description: Methode Import Servlet destination on production environment.

Node.Name: Advertisement Filter
Node.Description: Filter advertising material according to the naming convention supplied by SAP. Material not matching the naming convention will be removed from processing and deleted.

Node.Name: ErrorLogs
Node.Description: Log files will be deleted after 5 days.

Node.Name: Material Resize
Node.Description: Resize all incoming material wider than 15cm to the maximum with of 15cm, proportionally. Material which does not fit the measurement will not be upscaled.
Node.Settings: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?> <Configuration> <Setting NAME="SCALE_MODUS" VALUE="DoScaleInch" TYPE="STRING"/> <Setting NAME="SCALE_X" VALUE="425.197" TYPE="FLOAT"/> <Setting NAME="SCALE_Y" VALUE="1024.0" TYPE="FLOAT"/> <Setting NAME="SCALE_DIRECTION" VALUE="ReferenceEdgeXEdge" TYPE="STRING"/> <Setting NAME="KEEP_IMAGE_RESOLUTION" VALUE="true" TYPE="BOOL"/> <Setting NAME="X-RESOLUTION" VALUE="200.0" TYPE="FLOAT"/> <Setting NAME="Y-RESOLUTION" VALUE="200.0" TYPE="FLOAT"/> <Setting NAME="SCALING_LIMIT_OPERATION" VALUE="SCALING_LIMIT_DOWNSCALE_ONLY" TYPE="STRING"/> <Setting NAME="CONTINUE_ON_SCALE_ERROR" VALUE="false" TYPE="BOOL"/> <Setting NAME="MAX_SCALE_FACTOR" VALUE="1.0" TYPE="FLOAT"/> <Setting NAME="UI_RESOLUTION_UNIT" VALUE="dpi" TYPE="STRING"/> <Setting NAME="UI_DIMENSION_UNIT" VALUE="cm" TYPE="STRING"/> <Setting NAME="PROCESS_ARO" VALUE="true" TYPE="BOOL"/> <Setting NAME="INTERPOLATION_METHOD" VALUE="1" TYPE="INT"/> <Setting NAME="AMENDO_SCALE_ENABLE_CM" VALUE="false" TYPE="BOOL"/> <Setting NAME="UI_OUTPUT_COLOR_SPACE" VALUE="ALL" TYPE="STRING"/> <Setting NAME="OUTPUT_PROFILE" VALUE="ICCProfiles/ISOnewspaper26v4.icc" TYPE="STRING"/> <Setting NAME="ATTACH_OUTPUT_PROFILE" VALUE="true" TYPE="BOOL"/> <Setting NAME="OUTPUT_DO_TAC_REDUCTION" VALUE="false" TYPE="BOOL"/> <Setting NAME="OUTPUT_DO_TAC_REDUCTION_MAX_TAC" VALUE="240.0" TYPE="FLOAT"/> <Setting NAME="OUTPUT_PROFILE_RI" VALUE="92" TYPE="INT"/> <Setting NAME="OUTPUT_USE_BPC" VALUE="false" TYPE="BOOL"/> <Setting NAME="GUESS_CMYK_PROFILE" VALUE="false" TYPE="BOOL"/> <Setting NAME="CMYK_PROFILE" VALUE="ICCProfiles/ISOnewspaper26v4.icc" TYPE="STRING"/> <Setting NAME="RGB_PROFILE" VALUE="ICCProfiles/ovsrgb.ICM" TYPE="STRING"/> <Setting NAME="GRAY_PROFILE" VALUE="ICCProfiles/ISOnewspaper26v4_gr.icc" TYPE="STRING"/> <Setting NAME="CONTINUE_ON_ICC_ERROR" VALUE="true" TYPE="BOOL"/> <Setting NAME="CONTINUE_ON_FILE_ERROR" VALUE="true" TYPE="BOOL"/> <Setting NAME="FILE_FORMAT" VALUE="AS_ORIGINAL" TYPE="STRING"/> <Setting NAME="JPEG_QUALITY" VALUE="83" TYPE="FLOAT"/> <Setting NAME="JPEG_USE_OLD_CMYK_COMPATIBILITY" VALUE="false" TYPE="BOOL"/> <Setting NAME="TIFF_COMPRESSION" VALUE="5" TYPE="INT"/> <Setting NAME="TIFF_JPEG_QUALITY" VALUE="94" TYPE="FLOAT"/> <Setting NAME="PNG_COMPRESSION" VALUE="5" TYPE="INT"/> <Setting NAME="EPS_COMPRESSION" VALUE="4" TYPE="INT"/> <Setting NAME="PDF_COMPRESSION" VALUE="8" TYPE="INT"/> <Setting NAME="PSD_ORIGINAL_AS_LAYER" VALUE="false" TYPE="BOOL"/> <Setting NAME="PSD_BACKGROUND_LAYER_ID" VALUE="1" TYPE="INT"/> <Setting NAME="PRESERVE_XMP" VALUE="true" TYPE="BOOL"/> <Setting NAME="FIX_FILE_EXTENSION" VALUE="true" TYPE="BOOL"/> <Setting NAME="DO_JPG_ARTIFACT_REMOVAL" VALUE="false" TYPE="BOOL"/> </Configuration>
